title: Not sure what this font is ..
content:
I’ve seen this font a lot recently (Nike and Freshjive), but I’m not sure what it is. It looks like DIN, except with beveled corners. Any ideas??

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080607042140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sparq_4706.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080607042140im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fjive_5367.jpg)

Thanks!

Cal

 [‹ Font Used in Good Magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20080607042140/http:/typophile.com/node/46123 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type in french ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080607042140/http:/typophile.com/node/46115 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Raised by Wolves

comments.content:
Thanks JH,

Sorry, I’m new!

Cal

I believe this has already been answered;

[http://typophile.com/node/46033](http://web.archive.org/web/20080607042140/http:/typophile.com/node/46033 "http://typophile.com/node/46033")

It’s ’United’, by House Industries.

JH

No need for an apology!

Have a good one.

JH
